General.Name: Südwestdeutsche Salzwerke AG
General.Description: Südwestdeutsche Salzwerke AG mines, produces, and sells salt in Germany, the Europe, and internationally. It offers sea salt under the Aquasale brand; food grade salt comprising evaporated table, cheese, pretzel, and compacted evaporated salt under the SALTA and JOSAL brands; feed salt and lick stones under the SALIT brand; nitrite pickling salt; and pharmaceutical salt, such as sodium chloride, natrium chloride, and granulated sodium chloride salt. The company also provides industrial salt for use in industrial and trade sectors, as well as electrolysis; water softening salt under the BROXO and CLARAMAT brands; pool salt under the ALPOSAL brand; de-icing salt; and salt brine. In addition, it offers winter road maintenance equipment comprising silos and grit containers; and conditions, recycles, and stores waste materials comprising flue gas cleaning residues. Further, the company offers logistic services that include inland shipping, handling, and warehousing services; and operates visitor mines and tourist facilities, which include Bad Friedrichshall and Berchtesgaden salt mines, as well as old saltworks in Bad Reichenhall. It also offers its products online. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Heilbronn, Germany.
